trans-unit.source: Provides a mandatory base class for all activity designer components.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base obrigatória para todas as atividades de componentes do designer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All activity designer components derive from ActivityDesigner.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Todos os componentes de designer de atividade derivam ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The ActivityDesigner provides a simple designer which lets the user visually design activities in the design mode.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityDesigner fornece um designer simple que permite ao usuário criar visualmente atividades no modo design.

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesigner provides a simple mechanism for the activities so they can participate in rendering the workflow on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityDesigner fornece um mecanismo simples para as atividades para que eles podem participar de processamento do fluxo de trabalho na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesigner lets the user customize layout and drawing associated with the activity.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityDesigner permite que o usuário personalize o layout e desenho associado à atividade.

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesigner lets the user extend the metadata associated with the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesigner permite que o usuário estenda os metadados associados à atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar o interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>atualmente atribuído ao controle, é criada uma nova instância de um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir a propriedade AccessibilityObject, você deve adicionar uma referência para o assembly de acessibilidade instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção de acessibilidade ativa da biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> to access the properties and events of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>para acessar as propriedades e eventos da atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the value for the enclosing rectangle of the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém o valor para o retângulo delimitador do designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: You can use the rectangle returned by the bounds method to determine the area enclosed by the designer plus the selection area.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o retângulo retornado pelo método limites para determinar a área entre o designer e a área de seleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that encloses the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que inclui o designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates if a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> pode ser definido como o pai da atividade associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for testing whether a designer can be parented by a particular <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil para testar se um designer pode ter um determinado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user initiates an insertion operation, such as drag-and-drop or paste.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um usuário inicia uma operação de inserção, como arrastar e soltar ou colar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> which can potentially be set as parent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> que potencialmente pode ser definido como pai.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> pode ser definido como o pai da atividade associada com o designer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a connection can be created between the specified connection point on the current activity designer and the specified connection point on a target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se uma conexão pode ser criada entre o ponto de conexão especificada no designer de atividade atual e o ponto de conexão especificado em um designer de atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CanConnect always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, sempre retorna CanConnect `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> para verificar no designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> para verificar o designer de atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that a connection can be created between source and target; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que uma conexão pode ser criada entre a origem e de destino; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a workflow view for the current activity designer using the specified ViewTechnology.
trans-unit.target: Cria um modo de exibição do fluxo de trabalho para o designer de atividade atual usando o ViewTechnology especificado.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CreateView displays the default design-time layout for the activity.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, criar modo de exibição exibe o layout de tempo de design padrão para a atividade.

trans-unit.source: The ViewTechnology to use to create the workflow view.
trans-unit.target: ViewTechnology usar para criar o modo de exibição do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that contains the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> que contém o designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of actions associated with configuration errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a matriz de ações associadas a erros de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a read-only array of actions associated with configuration errors.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna uma matriz de ações associadas a erros de configuração de somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: This list contains all configuration and validation errors for the Activity which can be presented to the end-user or used programmatically by the system hosting the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Essa lista contém todos os erros de validação e de configuração para a atividade que pode ser apresentada ao usuário final ou por meio de programação usada pelo sistema que hospeda o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A read-only array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de somente leitura de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current designer theme for the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tema atual do designer para o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains theme settings for the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> que contém as configurações de tema para designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> is being disposed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> está sendo descartado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> está sendo finalizada.

trans-unit.source: Performs the default UI action associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Executa a ação de interface do usuário padrão associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to perform the default UI action associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para executar a ação de interface do usuário padrão associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Default UI actions can include emitting the method associated with the default event in the code-beside file when a user double clicks the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Ações de interface do usuário padrão podem incluir emitindo o método associado com o evento padrão no arquivo code-beside quando um usuário clicar duas vezes a superfície do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity designer can be resized in a free form designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer de atividade pode ser redimensionado em um designer de formulário livre.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, EnableVisualResizing always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, sempre retorna EnableVisualResizing `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity designer can be resized in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer de atividade pode ser redimensionado um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Shifts the visible area of the screen to guarantee that the specified designer is visible.
trans-unit.target: Desloca a área visível da tela para garantir que o designer especificado está visível.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to move the visible area of the designer surface to show the designer of interest.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para mover a área visível da superfície do designer para mostrar o designer de interesse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows an object to clean up any resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, permite que um objeto limpar todos os recursos de forma determinista.

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Esse método limpa recursos chamando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A> to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A>para personalizar a limpeza.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of connection points for the activity designer along the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura de pontos de conexão para o designer de atividade ao longo especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All connection points are in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Todos os pontos de conexão estão em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> along which to gather the connection points.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> ao longo do qual obter os pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> generic read-only collection that is used as the points at which the activity designer can connect to other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> coleção genérica de somente leitura que é usada como os pontos em que o designer de atividade pode se conectar a outros designers de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that the designer uses for connections.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de pontos que o designer usa para conexões somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> on which to query for points.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> na qual deseja consultar os pontos de.

trans-unit.source: A point read-only collection that contains the connections to use for the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma ponto de coleção somente leitura que contém as conexões a ser usado para o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image of the activity designer on the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem do designer de atividade no especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object that contains a bitmap used as a preview image in the drag-and-drop operations and in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"></xref> preview pane.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objeto que contém um bitmap usado como uma imagem de visualização nas operações de arrastar e soltar e no <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup"> </xref> no painel de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Returns the designer associated with the design surface of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o designer associado à superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> that is the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent*> of the designer host.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> que é o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent*>do host do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent*>

trans-unit.source: Tries to retrieve the specified type of service from the design mode site for the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Tenta recuperar o tipo de serviço especificado do site de modo de design para a atividade associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to request.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the requested service or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o serviço solicitado ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of glyphs with which to adorn the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de glifos com a qual Adornar o designer.

trans-unit.source: Use Glyphs to access a read-only list of designer glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Use glifos para acessar uma lista somente leitura de glifos de designer.

trans-unit.source: These glyphs can be used to graphically represent components of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> in a graphical environment.
trans-unit.target: Esses glifos podem ser usados para representar graficamente os componentes do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>em um ambiente gráfico.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs to display on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> que contém os glifos para exibir no designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the ActivityDesigner at a specified point on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre o ActivityDesigner em um ponto especificado na tela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, together with the HitTest method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> control is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> control the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, junto com o método HitTest o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>controle é usado para determinar qual parte de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>controle o usuário clicou.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains logical coordinates of the point on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> where the mouse was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>contém lógicas coordenadas do ponto no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>onde o mouse foi clicado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method receives a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that contains an x and y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: O método HitTest recebe um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>que contém um x e y coordenar.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents a single x and y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa um único x e a coordenada y.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> em um momento específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: The Image property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Image é definida o <xref:System.Drawing.Image>para exibir.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso em tempo de design ou em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor para os limites da imagem associada com o designer em coordenadas lógicas do delimitadores.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageRectangle to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use o ImageRectangle para recuperar as coordenadas para o retângulo que contém a imagem associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas coordenadas para desenhar conectores ou sobreposição de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> image.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com associado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initialize loads the designer with the Activity specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializar carrega o designer com a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The designer loads the Activity service, updates the verbs associated with the activity and assigns the default text and image to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O designer carrega o serviço de atividade, atualiza os verbos associados à atividade e atribui o texto padrão e a imagem para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which the designer should be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com que o designer deve ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the designer.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o designer.

trans-unit.source: Use Invalidate to cause designer to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Use Invalidate para fazer com que o designer para ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified rectangle on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o retângulo especificado no designer.

trans-unit.source: Use Invalidate to cause the specified rectangle on the designer to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Use Invalidate para fazer com que o retângulo especificado pelo designer para ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area on the workflow to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especificam a área do fluxo de trabalho para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer of the activity that invokes the activity associated with the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o designer de atividade que invoca a atividade associada com o designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, the InvokingDesigner get operation returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the set operation throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, o InvokingDesigner obter operação retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) e a operação de definição lança <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to invoke the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> para invocar o designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: A set operation was attempted on InvokingDesigner.
trans-unit.target: Foi tentada uma operação definida em InvokingDesigner.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current designer's activity is commented or is inside a commented activity.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a atividade atual do designer é comentada ou está dentro de uma atividade comentada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> no designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity is commented or is inside a commented activity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a atividade é comentada ou está dentro de uma atividade comentada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity associated with the designer can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a atividade associada com o designer pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: IsLocked determines whether an activity can be modified.
trans-unit.target: IsLocked determina se uma atividade pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: This affects drag operations, changes to properties, and changes to the position of the activity in the designer window.
trans-unit.target: Isso afeta as operações de arrastar, as alterações nas propriedades e altera a posição da atividade na janela do designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity associated with the designer can be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a atividade associada com o designer pode ser modificada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity associated with the designer is the primary selection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a atividade associada com o designer é a seleção principal.

trans-unit.source: You can use IsPrimarySelection to affect highlighting or update property sheets in your graphical representation of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar IsPrimarySelection para afetar o realce ou atualizar folhas de propriedade em sua representação gráfica do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: IsPrimarySelection is useful when multiple activities are selected as IsPrimarySelection will indicate the starting point of a multiple selection.
trans-unit.target: IsPrimarySelection é útil quando várias atividades são selecionadas como IsPrimarySelection indicará o ponto de partida de uma seleção múltipla.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity associated with the designer is the primary selection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a atividade associada com o designer é a seleção principal; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer is a root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer é um designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The root designer will have no designers as its parent.
trans-unit.target: O designer raiz não terá nenhum designers de seu pai.

trans-unit.source: The root designer acts as the designer for the complete workflow as all workflow components will be children.
trans-unit.target: O designer raiz atua como o designer do fluxo de trabalho completo como todos os componentes de fluxo de trabalho será filhos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer is a root designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer é um designer raiz. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity associated with the designer is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a atividade associada com o designer está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSelected property for operations such as cut and paste, or updating the properties of an Activity when changes are made in a property window, for example.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade IsSelected para operações como Recortar e colar ou atualizar as propriedades de uma atividade quando forem feitas alterações em uma janela de propriedade, por exemplo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity associated with the designer is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a atividade associada com o designer está selecionado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activity type is supported if the activity designer is a root designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o tipo de atividade especificada é suportado se o designer de atividade é um designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: IsSupportedActivityType is called only if the activity designer is a root designer.
trans-unit.target: IsSupportedActivityType é chamado apenas se o designer de atividade é um designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The type of the activity that was supported.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da atividade que tinha suporte.

trans-unit.source: if the activityType is supported; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o activityType com suporte; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity associated with the designer is visible on the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a atividade associada com o designer está visível no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Use IsVisible to determine whether an activity is visible on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use IsVisible para determinar se uma atividade está visível no designer.

trans-unit.source: For large workflows you could provide a search mechanism and locate, select, and move into the viewable area an activity currently not visible found by the user.
trans-unit.target: Para grandes fluxos de trabalho você pode fornecer um mecanismo de pesquisa e localizar, selecionar e mover para a área visível uma atividade no momento não é visível encontrada pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity associated with the designer is visible on the workflow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a atividade associada com o designer estiver visível no fluxo de trabalho; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the designer from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado de exibição do designer de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer state.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>usados para restaurar o estado do designer.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local do designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Use the Location property to position the designer on the design surface at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de local para posicionar o designer na superfície de design em tempo de design ou tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The location of the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O local do designer em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of message filters that are associated with the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de filtros de mensagem que estão associados com o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> read-only collection that includes all standard message filters to associate with the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que inclui todos os filtros de mensagem padrão para associar com o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho mínimo para o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: MinimumSize is determined by the size settings accessible through the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MinimumSize é determinado pelas configurações de tamanho acessíveis por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerTheme%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerTheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum size of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho mínimo do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when the activity it is associated with changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando a atividade está associada a alterações.

trans-unit.source: `e` contains data about what changes were made to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: `e`contém dados sobre quais alterações foram feitas para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to update the designer state and the UI displayed on the workflow designer when a user makes changes to an activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para atualizar o estado do designer e a interface do usuário exibida no designer de fluxo de trabalho quando um usuário faz alterações em uma atividade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user starts to visually resize the activity designer when the designer is in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando um usuário inicia redimensionar visualmente o designer de atividade quando o designer estiver no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use OnBeginResizing to perform any design-time processing of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> when a user starts resizing the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar OnBeginResizing para executar qualquer processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>quando um usuário inicia o redimensionamento de designer de atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection is established between two connection points.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma conexão é estabelecida entre dois pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: OnConnected has no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnConnected não tem nenhum comportamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override this method in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to provide processing when a connection is made between two designers.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituir esse método em uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>para fornecer processamento quando uma conexão é feita entre dois designers.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The source ConnectionPoint on the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A fonte ConnectionPoint no designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: The target ConnectionPoint on the activity designer to connect to.
trans-unit.target: O destino ConnectionPoint no designer de atividade para se conectar ao.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is completed inside designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação de arrastar e soltar é concluída dentro dos limites de designer.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a drag-drop operation ends within the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando uma operação arrastar-soltar termina dentro dos limites do designers.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer enters the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o ponteiro entra nos limites de designer.

trans-unit.source: The OnDragEnter event is raised when the mouse is dragged into the designer.
trans-unit.target: O evento OnDragEnter é gerado quando o mouse é arrastado para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse comment state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no estado de comentário do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the OnDragEnter for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, OnDragEnter para este designer é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, see comment the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, ver comentários sobre os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer leaves the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o ponteiro sai dos limites de designer.

trans-unit.source: The OnDragLeave event is raised when the user drags the pointer out of the designer or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento OnDragLeave é gerado quando o usuário arrasta o ponteiro fora do designer ou o usuário cancela a operação de arrastar e soltar atual.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the OnDragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites de designer, o evento OnDragLeave é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>para este designer é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the OnDragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o evento OnDragLeave é gerado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer is within the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o ponteiro está dentro dos limites do designers.

trans-unit.source: The OnDragOver event is raised when the user drags the pointer over of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O evento OnDragOver é gerado quando o usuário arrasta o ponteiro sobre do designer.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: - Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: -As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>para este designer é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the OnDragOver event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o evento OnDragOver é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the OnDragOver event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o evento OnDragOver é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The OnDragOver and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O OnDragOver e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is finished visually resizing the activity designer when the designer is in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando um usuário for concluído visualmente redimensionando o designer de atividade quando o designer estiver no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when the user clicks on the configuration errors associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o usuário clica nos erros de configuração associados com o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> associated with the configuration error.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> associado ao erro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: designerAction contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: designerActioncontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Updates the visual cues for feedback supplied to the user when performing a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza as indicações visuais para comentários fornecidos para o usuário ao executar uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released when the designer has keyboard focus.

trans-unit.source: You should override this method to perform any layout processing required when a user repositions items on the activity designer surface at design time.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituir este método para executar qualquer processamento de layout necessário quando o usuário reposiciona os itens na superfície do designer de atividade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.target: OnMouseCaptureChanged ocorre quando o usuário seleciona um número de objetos no designer, arrastando o ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseDoubleClick occurs when the mouse button is clicked twice in succession above a designer.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts to drag the mouse on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário começa a arrastar o mouse no designer.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: - Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: -As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>para este designer é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents a single x and y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa um único x e a coordenada y.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user stops dragging the mouse on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário para de arrastar o mouse sobre o designer.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on each movement of the mouse as the user drags the pointer over the designer.
