trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro está em limites de designer.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: - Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: -As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>para este designer é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the pointer leaves designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro sai dos limites de designer.

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual da atividade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Allows the designer to process raw Win32 messages.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o designer processar mensagens de Win32 brutas.

trans-unit.target: Win32 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the drag operation should continue.
trans-unit.target: Controla se a operação de arrastar deve continuar.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir descreve como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: If the designer is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer é um destino válido, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: - Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: -As alterações no estado de botão do mouse, posição do ponteiro e estado de teclado são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o usuário sai dos limites do designers, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A> for that designer is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra outro designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>para este designer é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo designer, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the OnQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: -Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, OnQueryContinueDrag evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, soltar os dados, ou para cancelar a operação com base no valor da propriedade Action do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A>eventos são combinados para que, como o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário é fornecido com a maioria dos até comentários de data na posição do mouse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnGiveFeedback%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem pode executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>é gerado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragLeave%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando um usuário é visualmente redimensioná-lo em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The method is only called if the activity designer is a child of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado somente se o designer de atividade é um filho de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeFormActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `e` specifies the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges> and new bounds being used for the resized <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: `e`Especifica o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges>novo limites que está sendo usados para redimensionado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> e</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user changes the scroll position.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando um usuário altera a posição de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: OnScroll provide no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnScroll não fornecer nenhum comportamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to provide processing logic when a scroll position changes.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituí-la em uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>para fornecer lógica de processamento quando uma posição de rolagem é alterada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> on which the user changed position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> em que o usuário alterou a posição.

trans-unit.source: The new scroll position value.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de posição de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Exibe os verbos do designer associados com uma marca inteligente no ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that designates the location to show the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que designa o local para mostrar a marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> whether a smart tag should be displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> se uma marca inteligente deve ser exibida ou ocultada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the smart tag should be displayed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the smart tag should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a marca inteligente deve ser exibida; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que a marca inteligente deve ser ocultada.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer que o tema associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent designer of the existing designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer do pai do designer existente.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ParentDesigner to move up the tree of nested <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects or to find the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o ParentDesigner para mover a árvore de aninhada <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>objetos ou para localizar o designer raiz.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The parent designer of the existing designer.
trans-unit.target: O designer do pai do designer existente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> is a root designer then the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> returned will be the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> will be the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> é um designer raiz o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> retornado será o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>; caso contrário, o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> será o pai <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow view that contains the current activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo de exibição do fluxo de trabalho que contém o designer de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: Updates the layout of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o layout do designer.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the configuration errors associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os erros de configuração associados com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Designer actions represent the possible configuration errors associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: Ações de designer representam os erros de configuração possíveis associados a um designer.

trans-unit.source: Calling RefreshDesignerActions updates these errors with any recent changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar RefreshDesignerActions atualiza esses erros com alterações recentes.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the activity designer verbs associated with the designer by calling the status handler.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os verbos do designer de atividade associados com o designer chamando o manipulador de status.

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are shown in context menus and menu bars.
trans-unit.target: Verbos do Designer são mostrados em barras de menus e menus de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Calling RefreshDesignerVerbs will refresh the menus to show any recent changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar RefreshDesignerVerbs atualizará os menus para mostrar alterações recentes.

trans-unit.source: Stores the view state of the designer into a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado de exibição do designer em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: The view state is the accumulation of the values of designer properties.
trans-unit.target: O estado de exibição é o acúmulo dos valores de propriedades do designer.

trans-unit.source: When the view state is saved to a stream, the designer values and settings can be restored using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o estado de exibição é salvo em um fluxo, as configurações e valores de designer podem ser restauradas usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> into which the view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>em que o estado de exibição é armazenado.</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Shows the specified info tip.
trans-unit.target: Mostra a dica de informações especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use ShowInfoTip to show a rectangle of text that can be used to display extended information about the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use ShowInfoTip para mostrar um retângulo do texto que pode ser usado para exibir informações estendidas sobre o designer.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the InfoTip.
trans-unit.target: O texto para exibir o InfoTip.

trans-unit.source: Displays the info tip for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with the specified title and text.
trans-unit.target: Exibe a dica de informações para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> com o título especificado e o texto.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title of the info tip.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o título da dica de informações.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the info tip text to display.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto de dica de informações para exibir.

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified tool tip in the specified rectangle location.
trans-unit.target: Exibe a dica de ferramenta especificado no local especificado do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the tool tip to display.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a dica de ferramenta a ser exibida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the location at which to display the tool tip.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define o local no qual exibir a dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the activity should show a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a atividade deve mostrar uma marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Use ShowSmartTag to determine whether to show a smart tag when an activity has focus in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use ShowSmartTag para determinar se deve mostrar uma marca inteligente quando uma atividade tem o foco no designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the activity should show a SmartTag; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a view object for the specified view technology.

trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>é convertido em um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>
